de.weltraumschaf.juberblog

Class BlogConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.BlogConfiguration

  • public class BlogConfiguration
extends Object
    Blog configuration. Abstracts the configuration properties file.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
